The Stanford Institute for Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence (HAI) invites you to propose a radical policy idea. Proposals chosen will be discussed live at the HAI 2021 Fall Conference on Policy & AI: Four Radical Proposals for a Better Society.

Policy ideas should be focused on the impact of artificial intelligence on humanity. Policy proposals can come from anyone, living anywhere, aimed at any geography or level of government. This event is not limited to the U.S.

https://hai.stanford.edu/events/hai-fall-conference-policy-ai-four-radical-proposals-better-society

HAI Fall Conference on Policy & AI: Four Radical Proposals for a Better Society
